string-array.name: food_details
string-array.item: Margherita Pizza: A classic pizza with a simple tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and basil.
Pepperoni Pizza: A delicious pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices, cheese, and tomato sauce.
BBQ Chicken Pizza: Grilled chicken with BBQ sauce, red onions, and a blend of cheeses.
Veggie Supreme Pizza: A healthy pizza with a variety of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, onions, and olives.
Hawaiian Pizza: A pizza topped with sweet pineapple and savory ham.
Cheeseburger: A burger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.
Bacon Burger: A burger topped with crispy bacon, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.
Double Patty Burger: A hearty burger with two beef patties, cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.
Mushroom Swiss Burger: A savory burger with sautéed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, lettuce, and tomato.
Spicy Chicken Burger: A spicy chicken patty with jalapeños, lettuce, tomato, and spicy mayo.
